Articles.Content:
Post some fake statistics on here of the odds of your ships failing. Make sure to include the ever-so-rare chance of success!

5% Chance rocket is destroyed on pad

10% Chance rocket spins out of control

5% Chance detached part comes back for revenge

30% Chance rocket crashes into Mun

20% Chance rocket runs out of fuel

10% Chance rocket crashes into Kerbin

All in all a 20% chance of success.

2% chance of pad explosion

1% chance of staging failure

5% change of stability issues resulting in emergency lithobraking

5% chance of catastrophic structural compromise

0.5% chance of overheat

So, that\'s 86.5% chance of success

I\'m so good a pilot and engineer that KSP is beginning to lost it\'s magic :\'(

30% Chance of pad explosion

20% Chance of upside down at 1km

20% Chance of staging failure

25% Chance my orbit will be <60km

5% Chance of even getting orbit. (Success?)

10% for exploding on the launch pad

1% for control issues.

10% runs out of fuel in accent.

1% crash into kerbin

1% crash while in orbit

1% running out of fuel in orbit

86% chance of success
